5 'GOL4I LITE
10 CLP:POKE#7D0,132,70,0,32,0,35,0,36,37,0,0,38,45,66,6,208,1,45,4,208,2,45,2,208,237,30,118,28,246,231,66,9,87,1,199,27,2,180,0,33,18,66,4,209,54,66,9,209
11 LET[0],8471,329,57350,10774,53508,11778,53506,8471,329,16969,16959,53507,16941,53510,12576,57348,12063,53506,11522,53504,14624,10,48130,6167,6527 
12 LET[25],9504,17262,6591,16161,8713,530,6335,23677,17765,53504,7259,7268,11273,53700,9359,292,23140,2246,247,7111,6453,9735,7158,23663,6276
13 LET[50],8705,16562,23654,17766,53511,11011,53257,11012,53255,9471,16482,16407,57346,11011,53505,17175,21615,7232,2370,10775,53666,57344,18052,8192,8713
14 LET[75],530,9103,283,23131,9216,2278,247,7143,6389,9735,7158,23663,16631,9473,16431,6309,12033,53505,7232,18023,21615,7268,2405,11543,53739,18288
25 S=#700:C=#ED
30 CLS:W=0:FORI=0TO95:POKES+I,0:NEXT
35 G=RND(736):M=G/8+S:F=7-G%8:R=PEEK(M):R=R|1<<F:POKEM,R:IFUSR(#890,C)<256GOTO35
40 WAIT1:K=INKEY():CLK:IFBTN(0)=1GOTO30
45 P=USR(#7D0,C):W=W+1:LC0,23:?"GEN:";W;:LC24,23:?"POP:";DEC$(P,3);:GOTO40
